name: search_for_recipes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool low_carb_recipes.
Tool description: Highly flexible search over thousands of low-carb/keto recipes with rich nutrients information.
API description: Search for recipes that match provided criterions

maxnetcarbs.description: Maximum net carbs (total carbs minus fiber and sugar alcohols) per serving in grams. Default is 5.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

maxcalories.description: Maximum calories per serving in KCal. Default is 500.

maxpreparetime.description: Maximum preparation time in minutes. Default is 10.

excludeingredients.description: Semicolon-separated terms to be excluded in ingredients. Default is 'cinnamon'.

tags.description:
Semicolon separated tags, supported tags are: 
```
15-minute-meals
3-ingredient-meals
5-ingredient-meals
appetizer
beef-free
beverages
breakfast
chicken-free
dairy-free
desserts
egg-free
eggs
fish
fish-free
freezer-friendly
french
gluten-free
good-for-leftovers
grains
high-protein
keto
kid-friendly
lchf
low-carb
lunch
main-dishes
meal-plan-ok
msg
no-cooking-required
one-pot-meals
paleo
pantry-recipes
peanut-free
peanuts
pescatarian
pork-free
quick-easy
relevant-meal--beverages
relevant-meal--breakfast
relev

name.description: Search terms to be appeared in the recipe name. Default is 'cake'.

maxaddedsugar.description: Maximum added sugar per serving in grams. Default is 0.

maxsugar.description: Maximum sugar per serving in grams. Default is 3.

maxcooktime.description: Maximum cook time in minutes. Default is 20.

includeingredients.description: Semicolon-separated terms to be included in ingredients. Default is 'egg;butter'.
